thread.title: Video of the week: Who shot Emmerdale's Robert Sugden?
thread.title_full: Video of the week: Who shot Emmerdale's Robert Sugden?

title: Video of the week: Who shot Emmerdale's Robert Sugden?
text:
0 comments 
Emmerdale is to air a flashback episode for the first time, in which it will be revealed who shot Robert Sugden. 
An hour-long edition of Emmerdale will turn the clocks back to celebrate the soap's 43rd anniversary at the end of October, showing the events of the previous two hours that led to Robert's shooting. Share article 
While the main focus of the rewind episode will explore the crucial moments leading up to the shooting, two other secrets from that night will be revealed, setting the scene for an explosive winter. One character that has been acting suspiciously since the night in question is Paddy Kirk. Viewers will have noticed that Paddy has been very cagey about his whereabouts since the incident, but did he shoot Robert or is he hiding another secret?
